name: cnrmnrm

stmt.origin: eqeltrrd(c0, cnrm, co(c0, crest, cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, ccnrm))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c0, cnrm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wceq(co(c0, crest, cuni(c0)), c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(co(c0, crest, cuni(c0)), cnrm))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CNrm → c0 ∈ Nrm)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CNrm →(c0[|`t]⋃ c0)= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CNrm →(c0[|`t]⋃ c0)∈ Nrm)

stmt.origin: mpdan(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(co(c0, crest, cuni(c0)), cnrm), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
stmt.pretty: mpdan(c0 ∈ CNrm, (c0[|`t]⋃ c0)∈ Nrm, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(co(c0, crest, cuni(c0)), cnrm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(cuni(c0), universe)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cuni(c0)), cnrm))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c0, cnrm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(cuni(c0), universe)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cuni(c0)), cnrm))

⊢ (c0 ∈ CNrm → c0 ∈ Nrm)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CNrm → ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ CNrm ∧ ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)→(c0[|`t]⋃ c0)∈ Nrm)
